title: A Level Sociology - The New Right in Education
description: Richard looks at The New Right in education for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, he will look at what The New Right believe and how they differ from other theories of education. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam. For more info visit www.senecalearning.com
